column2: kable('latex', caption = 'Lifeform -- A table showing the count and percentages of taxa by lifeform. data_Count: Number of taxa in the overall data exhibiting lifeform X. data_Percentage: Percentage of overall data composed of taxa exhibiting lifeform X. tree_Count: Number of taxa in the tree exhibiting lifeform X. tree_Percentage: Percentage of the tree composed of taxa exhibiting lifeform X. total_Percentage: Percentage of all taxa exhibiting lifeform X used in the tree.', booktabs = TRUE, longtable = TRUE) %>%
